pkgmetadata.longdescription: Maximum-Likelihood Perfect Phylogeny Inference at Scale // Fast maximum-likelihood phylogeny inference from noisy single-cell data using the 'ScisTree' algorithm by Yufeng Wu (2019) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btz676. 'scistreer' provides an 'R' interface and improves speed via 'Rcpp' and 'RcppParallel', making the method applicable to massive single-cell datasets (10,000 cells).
